name: korea
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a former country in East Asia that was divided into two parts in 1945 that later became the countries of North Korea and South Korea: Events in Korea brought the Marshall Plan to a premature conclusion. He has a grown daughter he adopted as a child from Korea.
More examplesFewer examplesKorea was later divided into North Korea and South Korea.Trainor is a retired Marine general who faced combat in Korea and Vietnam.The team name on display will be simply "Korea" although the athletes will then compete as separate countries.
